The user of the data should use the related publications as a baseline for their analysis whenever possible. Doing so will be an added safeguard against misinterpretation of the data. Related publications are listed in the metadata section of the Dataverse study.

fields.value: Database on GHG experiments conducted under the LivestockPlus project

datasetContactAffiliation.value: International Center for Tropical Agriculture - CIAT

dsDescriptionValue.value: The database contains data collected from experiments conducted different regions of Colombia (Meta, Atlántico, Casanare and Valle del Cauca). Specifically the data is on GHG emissions from urine and manure patches in grazed pastures and carbon stocks in representative pastures. In addition, there is data on enteric methane production. The collected data can be used as inputs for calculating national GHG emissions factors.

grantNumberAgency.value: CGIAR Research Program on Climate Change, Agriculture and Food Security (CCAFS)

files.description: Experiment conducted in a long-term experiment with tropical forages. In this experiment we measured the Nitrous oxide fluxes from plots with Brachiaria humidicola 678, Bh.16888, Panicum maximum and Mulato Hybrid.
files.label: 02. BNI Nitrous oxide CIAT.tab

dataFile.description: Experiment conducted in a long-term experiment with tropical forages. In this experiment we measured the Nitrous oxide fluxes from plots with Brachiaria humidicola 678, Bh.16888, Panicum maximum and Mulato Hybrid.

files.description: In the trail where we measured nitrous oxide fluxes, we also measured soil nitrogen, BNI potential, denitrification potential and DNA.
files.label: 03. BNI Urine patch CIAT.xls

dataFile.description: In the trail where we measured nitrous oxide fluxes, we also measured soil nitrogen, BNI potential, denitrification potential and DNA.

files.description: Evaluation of carbon stock in plots with tropical forages
files.label: 04. Carbon stock in pastures.tab

dataFile.description: Evaluation of carbon stock in plots with tropical forages

files.description: Experiment of determinate the emission factor of N2O from urine patches in pastures with Brachiaria humidicola and other with Brachiaria humidicula + Acharis pintail.
files.label: 05. GHG emissions Bh field llanos orientales.xls

dataFile.filename: 05. GHG emissions Bh field llanos orientales.xls
dataFile.description: Experiment of determinate the emission factor of N2O from urine patches in pastures with Brachiaria humidicola and other with Brachiaria humidicula + Acharis pintail.

files.description: Determination of emission factors in urine and manure patches in improved and degraded pasture in two regions in Colombia (Atlántico and Casanare), and GHG emissions for baseline soil. Soil carbon stocks were also evaluated.
files.label: 06. MADR-CIAT livestock project.xls

dataFile.description: Determination of emission factors in urine and manure patches in improved and degraded pasture in two regions in Colombia (Atlántico and Casanare), and GHG emissions for baseline soil. Soil carbon stocks were also evaluated.

files.description: We quantified the methane emissions per animal under different forages diet, using a polytunnel methodology.
files.label: 07. Politunel evaluation CIAT.xlsx

dataFile.description: We quantified the methane emissions per animal under different forages diet, using a polytunnel methodology.
